metadata.title: CVE-2024-27429 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netrom: Fix a data-race around sysctl_netrom_obsolescence_count_initialiserWe need to protect the reader reading the sysctl valuebecause the value can be changed concurrently.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
